required.token: Discord token for your bot that you can find at https://discordapp.com/developers/applications
required.rcon_ip: IP address of your DayZ server
required.rcon_port: RCon port for your DayZ server (may be different from the game port)
required.rcon_password: RCon password, found in the BattlEye profile directory in your server files

optional.bot_presence: Discord presence message for the bot to display
optional.bot_presence_type: Discord presence type from (playing, listening, watching) default: playing
optional.rcon_admin_log_channel: Discord Channel ID to publish admin events to. This will include sensitive info like player IPs
optional.rcon_chat_channel: Discord Channel ID where the linked DayZ to Discord chat will take place
optional.rcon_chat_ignore_regex: Pattern that, if matched, will not publish the message to the chat channel
optional.rcon_admin_channels: List of Discord Channel IDs that can send admin RCon commands
optional.rcon_count_channel: Discord Channel ID that will have its name updated to the current player count
optional.update_player_count_interval: Time, in seconds, between player count update queries
optional.rcon_keep_alive_interval: Time, in seconds, between RCon keep alive messages. The connection times out at around 45 seconds
optional.debug: Set the logging level to DEBUG for the locally running app. Equivalent to running with -v

log_events_in_discord.connect_disconnect_notices: Send connect and disconnect notices to chat channel
log_events_in_discord.player_count_updates: Send player count update notices to admin log channel
log_events_in_discord.rcon_messages: Send all RCon messages to admin log channel
log_events_in_discord.rcon_keep_alive: Send RCon keep alive status messages to admin log channel
log_events_in_discord.include_timestamp: Include timestamp on all messages from the bot

scheduled_commands.command: RCon command to run with parameters. Also accepts 'safe_shutdown'. See the template for examples
scheduled_commands.delay: Only used for 'safe_shutdown'. Specifies the delay in seconds before the shutdown
scheduled_commands.interval: Interval in seconds between runs of the command
scheduled_commands.with_clock: Whether the interval should be aligned with the clock instead of relative
scheduled_commands.offset: Delay in seconds from bot startup to running the command

deprecated.rcon_publish_channel: renamed to rcon_admin_log_channel to better reflect its purpose
